title: Data Interpretation - Sales Bar Chart
description: Analyze the provided sales data for 5 years and calculate the percentage growth between Year 2 and Year 4.

title: Palindrome check ignoring Case/Symbols
description: Check if a string is a palindrome after converting all uppercase letters into lowercase letters and removing all non-alphanumeric characters.

title: Python List vs Set Performance
description: Explain why looking up an item in a set is O(1) while in a list it is O(n).
